full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CES MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BUR MCHOD GTOR BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL RGYAS PAR PHYE BA YID BZHIN NOR BU DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BUR MCHOD GTOR BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL RGYAS PAR PHYE BA YID BZHIN NOR BU DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD GUS RAB TU BRTAN PA'I GZIMS 'GAGS PA MGON PO SKYABS NAS LAN BRGYA PHRAG GI BAR DU NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BAR BRTEN, CUNG ZAD ZHIG BRIS NAS BREL GA-YENG GIS RIM 'GYANGS SU LUS PA LAS, NYE LAM SKYABS MGON RDO RJE CHANG ^RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO CHE'I BKAL MJUG RDZOGS PAR BRIS SHIG CES GSUNG GI SNANG BSTZAL BAR RTEN, AA'I RIGS KYI BTZUN PA ^BEE RO TSA NA AARTHA SIDDHIS SYA LI KHI TAm SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DZA YANTU, ,)MGON PO YID BZHIN NOR BU'I MCHOD TSOGS 'DI, ,BLA MA YID BZHIN DBANG TSOGS ZHABS PAD BRTAN, ,MDO SNGAGS YID BZHIN 'DRA BA'I DAM CHOS 'PHEL, ,KHYAB DAG YID BZHIN NOR BU THOB PHYIR BSPOS, ,SA 'BYUG ZLA TSES LA DAM PA'I MING 'DZIN GYIS BRIS PA SIDDHI MANGGA LAm, ,
